message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its cutting-edge features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer in its field. For this unique opportunity, I'm offering it to you at an introductory price of $85. This is a limited-time offer, so don't miss out!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to pay a premium for a high-quality product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $70?

Thank you for your interest, Bob! I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate further. I'm proposing to sell the product to you for $75. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value and your budget.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $72? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my means.

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. Considering your feedback and our previous discussions, I'm happy to offer the product to you for $73. This is a reasonable compromise, and I believe it will be beneficial for both of us.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $70? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my means.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your continued interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer the product to you for $71. I hope this proposal will be acceptable and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $69? I'm willing to make a final compromise, but I need to stay within my means.

I understand your situation, Bob. After reevaluating our discussion, I'm willing to offer the product to you for $70. This is the lowest price I can go, but I believe it's a fair compromise considering the value of the product and your budget.
